caption.p: Binding energies calculated by AutoDock Vina for GTP, UTP, IDX-184, Sofosbuvir, Ribavirin, Remdisivir, Cinnamaldehyde, and Thymoquinone against COVID-19 (blue) and SARS HCoV (orange) RdRps. (For interpretation of the references to color in this figure legend, the reader is referred to the web version of this article.)
